org.jerkar.api.utils

Class JkUtilsIO

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jerkar.api.utils.JkUtilsIO

  • public final class JkUtilsIO
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class for dealing with Inputs/Outputs.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  JkUtilsIO.StreamGobbler
      Runs a thread copying all data from the specified input stream to sepecified output streams.

      • copyUrlContentToCacheFile

        public static java.nio.file.Path copyUrlContentToCacheFile(java.net.URL url,
                                                           java.io.PrintStream report,
                                                           java.nio.file.Path cacheDir)
        Copies the content of an url in a cache file. The cached file path will be [jerkar user dir]/cache/url-contents/[last segment of the url (after last '/')]. If the file already exist than the content of the url is not copied and the file is directly returned.
